meanings.sent1: My friend's last name is Toyo.
meanings.sent2: Toyo is a common surname in Japan.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if Mr. Toyo is related to the famous Toyo family.
meanings.sent4: The Toyo family tree stretches back for generations.
meanings.sent5: The name Toyo has a noble ring to it.

meanings.definition: A brand of die-cast toy vehicles.
meanings.sent1: I love playing with my Toyo cars.
meanings.sent2: Toyo is known for its high-quality toy vehicles.
meanings.sent3: The Toyo cars zoomed around the track in a race.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of Toyo cars sparkled like jewels.
meanings.sent5: The Toyo vehicles are a favorite among collectors.

meanings.definition: A type of plastic resin used in manufacturing.
meanings.sent1: The factory uses Toyo to make plastic products.
meanings.sent2: Toyo resin is durable and versatile.
meanings.sent3: The Toyo resin glowed under the factory lights.
meanings.sent4: The artist molded the Toyo into intricate shapes.
meanings.sent5: The smell of melting Toyo filled the air in the workshop.
